column6: Perfumy and the product expires in a few months!
column9: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2020
column14: Really perfumy! I love sandalwood, but this is something between cheap cologne and incense in my opinion. I had to use another cleanser to get it off. Also, the product says it expires in December. Even if it werenâ€™t going in the trash I would only have been able to use half of it before it expired!
